response.overview: A musician who lives alone on a Nebraska farm must confront the people of his past in the small town of Stanton in search of the man who nearly kills his beloved dog, on his journey he learns an important lesson he had long since forgot.
response.tagline: A musician who lives alone on a Nebraska farm must confront the people of his past in the small town of Stanton in search of the man who nearly kills his beloved dog, on his journey he learns an important lesson he had long since forgot.
response.title: Stanton
